text.div:
UK Core Death Notification Status

A ValueSet to identify the type of death notice as held on Personal Demographics Service (PDS).

Copyright Statement: Copyright © 2019 NHS Digital

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/CodeSystem/UKCore-DeathNotificationStatus

name: UKCoreDeathNotificationStatus
title: UK Core Death Notification Status
